Articles.Content: I was wondering if it would be feasible for SQUAD to upload squadcasts to their KSP youtube channel, and if they can I think they should do it, its always nice to get an update about whats going on from Max and see what missions is going on, but its not always possible for me to catch it live and I don't think I'm the only one with this issue. Just a small suggestion but it would be quite a big help.

Yes please.

It's a pita to try and follow all social links for KSP.

The forum or the KSP home site should have links or redirects to cover these.

Great idea!!!

Your a definetly not the only one. I usually can't watch them, but it would be nice to know what they have been talking about there. On quite a few occasions I only found out about a few bits from the squad cast on the forums and I also missunderstod some discussions because I was missing an important piece of information :/ just guessing here, but I think that discussions would be more on-topic and productive if everyone had access to all the relevant bits

Moved to the Kerbal Network.

(and yes, this would be wonderful)

I've suggested this a couple of times, it's a very worthwhile idea imho.

There are other podcasts available such as TB's co-optional podcast that livestream on twitch and then upload the podcast to youtube, so it is certainly doable.
The aerodynamics discussion has been moved here.

Hi there. Thanks for the suggestion. This is something that's been brought up before, but we felt it to be a bit unnecessary at this time, because the archived versions on Twitch are generally readily available. This is something we will definitely keep consideration on, especially for all of KSP-TV's streamers, but for the time being, at least. if you'd like to catch up on Squadcast, you can still find it on Twitch.
